main event: A reported UFO sighting took place in Elmira, N.Y. on 12-7-58 at 1830. It was observed as a round object leaving a long white trail near a missile pod, and the pilot believed it was a satellite moving. The sighting occurred on a hot day and was deemed as probably a mirage.
interesting points: The object was described as larger than a meteor and left a long white trail.
The pilot initially believed it was a satellite moving.
The sighting was attributed to the hot day and possibly being a mirage.
The pilot stated he believed it was a rocket from Sputnik 2.
There were no photographs of the reported UFO.
sighted object: round object leaving a long white trail
